name: tti-polyfill
description: Polyfill for Time to Interactive. See https://goo.gl/OSmrPk

scripts.generate_polyfill: mkdir -p gen && cat src/polyfillInit.js src/firstConsistentlyInteractiveCore.js src/activityTrackerUtils.js src/firstConsistentlyInteractiveDetector.js src/main.js > gen/ttci.js
scripts.generate_polyfill_minified: mkdir -p gen && babili src/polyfillInit.js src/firstConsistentlyInteractiveCore.js src/activityTrackerUtils.js src/firstConsistentlyInteractiveDetector.js src/main.js > gen/ttci.min.js
scripts.generate_userscript: npm run generate_polyfill && cat userscript/userscriptBeginning.js.txt gen/ttci.js userscript/userscriptEnding.js.txt > gen/TTI-Polyfill-UserScript.js

author: Deepanjan Roy (Google)
